meta_description.title: Limbo - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: In Catholic theology, Limbo is the afterlife condition of those who die in original sin without being assigned to the Hell of the Damned.

people_also_ask.heading: limbo, in Roman Catholic theology, the border place between heaven and hell where dwell those souls who, though not condemned to punishment, are deprived of the joy of eternal existence with God in heaven.
people_also_ask.title: limbo | Definition & History | Britannica

people_also_ask.heading: It's not that Limbo has a reputation for being the most terrifying game either. Even its most passionate players will tell you that Limbo isn't scary, but richly atmospheric and ominous. ... Released in 2010 and conceived by Artn Jensen, the side-scrolling Limbo is a 2D platformer whose plot is as simple as the mechanics.22-Jun-2016
people_also_ask.title: Six Years Later, 'Limbo' Still Works - Inverse

people_also_ask.heading: Limbo is a brilliant, puzzle game. The puzzles I think are fantastically challenging but there are online guides to walk you through it... Some of the imagery when you die I found quite disturbing, but I'm 12 and I completely coped with it!!! This is a great game try it out I would really recommend it....
people_also_ask.title: Kid reviews for Limbo | Common Sense Media

people_also_ask.heading: Limbo is a puzzle-platform video game developed by independent studio Playdead. ... Limbo is a 2D side-scroller, incorporating a physics system that governs environmental objects and the player character. The player guides an unnamed boy through dangerous environments and traps as he searches for his sister.

knowledge_panel.description: limbo is a puzzle-platform video game developed by independent studio playdead. the game was released in july 2010 on xbox live arcade, and has since been ported to several other systems, including the playstation 3, linux and microsoft windows. wikipedia
